replies.message: He does it in two different songs:p no love and drop the world
in song no love, and not afraid

Yes! Also the song "Forever" he dissed drake lil Wayne. K. west.. none of them realized it also there is a few other songs that he didn't do with lil Wayne that he disses him on ..like the song Seduction he just doesn't say hes name but you can tell who he is dissing
wow, I was thinking what song as well, and I'm listening to "No Love" right now.

One of the reasons he started dissing lil Wayne is because of what Wayne said about Em on that one radio interview ..Wayne said that he had been trying to contact Eminem an leaving messages telling Eminem that he wants to make some songs with him an Eminem never responded to hes messages.. An Wayne said that Eminem is Probley to scared to meet an talk to him ..as we all know that ain't true ..this was during the Time Em was popping pills an grieving deeply over the Death of PROOF
In Not Afraid i think he says,  instead of getting crowned your getting capped. Wayne was about to have crowns put in. Let me know if u agree. THX

Yes actually when Wayne had to do a year in jail for hes gun charge Wayne had to get all hes teeth root canaled an caped because do to the jails policys he could not be in jail with all the gold an diamonds  in hes mouth so they root canaled them an capped them be for he started hes jail bid...lyrics You said you were king,
 You lied through your teeth, for that fuck your feelings,
 Instead of gettin' crowned you're gettin' capped....see what I'm saying!..?

(what was actually said was) U said u were King u lied through your teeth. Fuck your fillings,instead of getting crowned your getting capped.  The day before lil wayne went to jail,he went to a Dentist and had 5 route canals. Its is obvious hes talking about lil wayne.
gimme the lyrics to the lil wayne diss in No Love nd Drop the World...
Something called BANTER. He knew he got dissed
